name: OhmConnect, Inc.
description: Provider of a real-time energy monitoring platform designed to increase energy efficiency. The company's platform monitors real-time conditions on the electricity grid, by receiving notifications to save energy by turning off lights during or by switching off appliances and then pays the consumers for the energy they saved, enabling them to have a positive environmental impact and benefit from the value they've generated.
one_liner: Provider of a real-time energy monitoring platform designed to increase energy efficiency. The company's platform monitors real-time conditions on the electricity grid, by receiving notifications to save energy by turning off lights during or by switching off appliances and then pays the consumers for the energy they saved, enabling them to have a positive environmental impact and benefit from the value they've generated.
